name: Spaghetti
instructions: Defrost chicken overnight in the fridge
Shake the korma sauce
Cut the 3 garlic, 1 small onion, 2 potatoes, chicken fillets into half (try to get 9/12 chicken fillet pieces after cutting)
Wash the potatoes and chicken fillet
Add 2 tsp oil in pan, put on high heat
Saute garlic then saute onion
Change to medium heat
Add chicken pieces and potato
Add 1/2 tsp ground black pepper, Add the korma sauce,  1/3 ladle fish sauce ladle,  1/2 tablespoon salt
Stir everything together
close lid simmer for 20 minutes (stir every 10 minutes)
description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Suscipit, ut?
